snippet: FIFA has delayed its investigation of the American soccer official Chuck Blazer, who is accused of financial corruption, until next year.
abstract: FIFA delays until 2014 its investigation of American soccer official Chuck Blazer, who is accused of financial corruption; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: FIFA has delayed its investigation of the American soccer official Chuck Blazer, who is accused of financial corruption, until next year.

headline.main: FIFA’s Inquiry Into Blazer’s Finances Delayed
